CdrDoc.CdrDocXml: <?xml version="1.0"?> <!-- Testing document promotion. --> <!-- Testing CVS on Verdi (2). --> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output method="html"/> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*"/> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
